casebody.data:
VAUGHAN
v.
MASHBURN, et al. 42PA17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 18, 2017 Patricia P. Shields, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Travis E. Collum, Attorney at Law, Mooresville, Kevin M. Duffan, Attorney at Law, Joshua D. Neighbors, Attorney at Law, Richard N. Shapiro, Attorney at Law, for Vaughan, Maria. Harold Holmes, Attorney at Law, Bradley K. Overcash, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, John D. Branson, Attorney at Law, for Mashburn, Lindsay (M.D.), et al. Daniel Hardison Wood, Attorney at Law, for N.C. Advocates for Justice

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th of April 2017 by NC Advocates for Justice for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of April 2017."

Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i).
